name: Jacinto
description:
Jacinto RL Play the latest build at: https://david-vanderhaar.github.io/jacinto_rl/ Goal

Defend Jacinto the last human bastion on Sera. Move block by block and clear the city of Grubs until you can locate and defeat their leader, Skorge.

Hints

Destroy Emergence Holes ASAP.
Spend Upgrade Points.
Weapon accuracy decreases over distance.
Collect ammo and reload often.
Use grenades at your own risk.
If you intend to fight Grubs up close, be sure to equip your favorite melee weapon.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Actions: Trigger actions by clicking the action cards below the map or using the keyboard.
